pic1_alt: 2024 Holiday Schedule. The dates of the 11 federal holidays in 2024. New Year's Day is Monday, January 01. Birthday of Martin Luther King, Jr, is Monday, January 15. Washington's Birthday is Monday, February 19. Memorial Day is Monday, May 27. Juneteenth National Independence Day is Wednesday, June 19. Independence Day is Thursday, July 04. Labor Day is Monday, September 02. Columbus Day is Monday, October 14. Veterans Day is Monday, November 11. Thanksgiving Day is Thursday, November 28. Christmas Day is Wednesday, December 25.
pic2_alt: The Wikipedia logo, a globe featuring glyphs from various writing systems, including Latin, Greek, Cyrillic, Arabic, Hebrew, Chinese, and Japanese.
